Currency

Future

There is no printed official currency in this world. Since the old coinage from Vaaloria was made of gold, it still carries some value, however fixed prices are rarely used. Instead most purchases are made on a barter system, simple trading of commodities.


Past

The official coinage originated in Vaaloria and are simple gold pieces. Other kingdoms currency was eventually abandoned as the gold pieces became the universal standard. Their design is a small disk with 3 notches (triangle shaped) cut from them. The front bears the likeness of one of Vaaloria's first leaders named Myrah who unified the kingdom. The coins, which have essentially become the de-facto standard of coinage among all of the large kingdoms also now bear the seal of Vaaloria, Oro, and Kvalis on the rear signifying their acceptance among the 3 kingdoms.
